top_comments.comment: I love your videos, I'm a chef and I love making cooking videos!🎉🎉🎉🎉🎉

Oh waw..so amazing
Thank you my dear sweet and smiley John for this great recipe.
You always make my day and I am grateful I found your channel through the pandemic because I gett happy when I watch you cook and hear your nice comforting voice🌺🌼❣🍁

comments_since_last_sample.body: Omg these are my favorite cookies of all time
My daughter and I love the Preppy Kitchen. It makes me want to start cooking and baking.
Be sure to use European Unsalted butter, or buy unsalted butter WITHOUT water.  Makes a difference in all desserts.
Thanks but I think you need to spend more time
Keebler Pecan Sandies and Vanilla icecream was my jam growing up. I'm going to make this for Thanksgiving. Thanks for the recipe!
